entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Squamish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:14 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Squamish Airport 10:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: 1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 1.8°C
Wind: NNW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers at times heavy. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Showers changing to rain at times heavy after midnight. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind light except north 40 km/h over southern sections. Wind becoming south 20 km/h overnight. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Showers at times heavy. High 8.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to showers in the morning and ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 20 mm. Wind south 20 km/h except southeast 50 gusting to 80 near Bowen Island in the morning. Wind becoming light late in the morning. High 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Rain at times heavy. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain at times heavy beginning late in the evening. Amount 20 mm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 except 70 gusting to 90 near Bowen Island late in the evening and overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
